name: A Kingdom Falls...IN LOVE
description:
YOU ARE A ROYAL SNAIL!!! And your parents are forcing you to marry an asshole Roach prince or else your kingdom will be destroyed!! Will you marry the Roach? Love another bug? Orrrrr will you be with no one :O. It's up for you to decide not only your fate but your Kingdom's as well! good luck -w-

Music is by Alkakrab!

Let me know if you have any suggestions or what I could do better!
